title: Client Management
description: Manage client profiles, contacts, GSTIN verification, and client portal access
overview: The Client Management module is your central hub for managing all client relationships. Create detailed client profiles with GSTIN auto-verification, manage multiple contacts per client, organize clients into groups, and configure portal access for client self-service.

keyFeatures.title: Client Directory
keyFeatures.description: Comprehensive client database with search and filtering

keyFeatures.title: GSTIN Auto-Fill
keyFeatures.description: Automatic verification and data population from GSTIN

keyFeatures.title: Contact Management
keyFeatures.description: Track multiple contacts per client with roles and preferences

keyFeatures.title: Client Groups
keyFeatures.description: Organize related clients under parent groups

keyFeatures.title: Portal Access
keyFeatures.description: Configure client self-service portal credentials and permissions

keyFeatures.title: Communication History
keyFeatures.description: Track all client communications and interactions
